ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Somethign I would like you all to evaluate
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya Kwasi!! I love the Mano War song.  That band always gets me going!  Some excellent shots  in game.  Some of those things even I haven t seen yet.  still
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya Kwasi!!
 
I love the Mano War song.  That band always gets me going!  Some excellent shots  in game.  Some of those things even I haven't seen yet.  still working on it.  As far as some things to work on..  Me personally, I had a very hard time reading some of the captions in red as they came into the frame. I'd suggest making them in a different color, possibly contrasting it with the background.  For example, if the background is light, use a dark font color, and vice versa. That was really the main thing.  The other thing I wondered is if it were possibly to import MPEG video into Flash, Here was my thought:  I have a video card with a TV out.  I could easily play EverQuest while connected to a standard TV and use a VCR to record the game play.  Then I have a video capture card with a video in port.  I could then connect the VCR to that and capture what I had recorded from EverQuest and save it as an MPEG file.  Then, if Flash can import MPEG files, maybe you could then syncronize the music to the video so you get some "live" action fight scenes in it.
 
I have never used Flash before so I don't know if it can be done.  However, I have a few friends that do use it so I will ask them and get back to you.
 
But that'd be my thoughts.  Otherwise, it's very kickass and stuff!
 
Wulfric Rennison
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: cpp1701e@...
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, February 14, 2004 5:42 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Somethign I would like you all to evaluate

I just recently took on a project by my guild.  namely to make a flash movie for them. 
 
Understand i have never created anything of this nature until now and  it took me a month to go from start to finish.  I would appreciate it if you all would go to
http://www.kwasient.com/EQ/LoV/lov.html
and let me know what I could possibly do to improve when I start the next one
 
Thanks
 
Halyburton Bearhugger
55 Barb Shaman
Legion of Vengeance
Saryrn
